TwitchReward1Name.label: Title of Twitch Reward
TwitchReward1Name.tooltip: Specify the name of the Twitch Reward that will trigger this event when detected.

TwitchReward1ActivationType.label: Activation Point
TwitchReward1ActivationType.tooltip: Set whether the reward should be triggered immediately on reward redemption by viewer, or when the reward is accepted/rejected from the reward queue. Note: twitch currently doesn't return a way to distinguish between Accept or Reject so Reject will still trigger the reward.

Media1Path.label: Path to media files
Media1Path.tooltip: Specify the path to the media (gif, jpeg, png, etc) to pull.

Media1Delay.label: Media Delay in Seconds
Media1Delay.tooltip: Specify the number of seconds to wait before updating to next media element after a reward has been redeemed.

TwitchAuthCode.label: Twitch Auth Code
TwitchAuthCode.tooltip: Enter an Auth Code that allows the bot to read channel point redemptions on the channel being watched.

btnGetToken.label: Get Token
btnGetToken.tooltip: Generate an Auth Code for the watched twitch account with permissions to read channel point redemptions.

btnDeleteSavedTokens.label: Delete Saved Tokens
btnDeleteSavedTokens.tooltip: Clear out saved tokens so that a new Authorization Code can be used.

btnRefreshTokens.label: Refresh Saved Tokens
btnRefreshTokens.tooltip: Manually trigger a refresh of access token using refresh token..
